All About Me! Meerkats!

Hi, welcome to my tribute page! I'm Meerkats and I love fuzzy cats and gaming. My primary game(s) include, as you can see, are World Of Warcraft (WoW or Warcraft) and Final Fantasy 14 (FF14). I primarily play a healer in both games, but I do enjoy sprinkling in some Damage Dealing (DPS or DPSing) from time to time. Enjoy your time here, and make sure you give your animals big hugs :)

            Fav. Minions

              My Favorite Is The Maine Coon

              They're massive! Their fur is incredibly fluffy
              They have high social needs
              They can be affected with heterochromia
              Males can weigh upwards of 12 pounds, often more.
              Their fur can be a a range of colors and patterns, including:
              • Tabby, Smoke, Shaded
              • Tortiseshell, Golden
              • White, Black, Red, Cream
              • Bicolor, Tricolor/Calico
              • Silver, Bluecream
              Their fur can shed quite a bit!
              In addition to heterochromia, they can have Copper, Green, and Golden eyes
              Their average lifespan is 9-13 years.

              • Adopt

              • Maine Rescue

              • Rescue

              • MC Adopt

              • Adopt A Cat
